source.content: As all eyes r on the police murder of #MikeBrown in #Ferguson, 3 more unarmed Americans killed by police in LA, Dallas & Tulsa in past week.

comment.content: @HSamyAlim @DrJLMooreIII OMG! Sad. Do you have any names/info?!
@HSamyAlim @TheBlackVoice give us names man. They deserve justice too. We'll revolt for all of them. Could be us next week.
